titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B189b1
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-B189b1

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

div.tei:ab:

Restored full text of this inscription:
1.[…] ʿAlabum and Nabaṭʿamm bin [Hawafīʿathat] 2.[…] their tomb of Yāfiʿat and its ha[ll and all] 3.[…] by the command of ʾAnbay, and let there be no vio[lation].

by the command of ʾAnbay, and let there be no
Restored full text of this inscription:
… ʿAlabum and Nabaṭʿamm bin Hawafīʿathat
… their tomb of Yāfiʿat and its hall and all
… by the command of ʾAnbay, and let there be no violation.
